Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Establishes a small business tax credit for the employment of persons sixty-five years of age and older
Summary: Establishes a small business tax credit for the employment of persons sixty-five years of age and older making less than seventy-five thousand dollars.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a small business tax credit for the employment of persons sixty-five years of age or older
